# Upstream: TillFleisch/ESPHome-HLK-LD2450

Source: https://github.com/TillFleisch/ESPHome-HLK-LD2450
License: MIT

This project may import or port portions of the LD2450 UART/protocol handling and
zone logic from the upstream project for use in an ESP-IDF firmware targeting ESP32-H2.

When code is imported, this file should be updated with:
- upstream commit hash
- list of imported files
- summary of modifications
